definition: to state explicitly in writing/to specify/to stipulate
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: An invitation for submission of bid shall clearly contain the particulars set forth in Paragraph 2 of Article 16 of this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投標邀請書應當載明本法第十六條第二款規定的事項。

sentences.english: In the application shall be stated the reasons therefor, with relevant evidence attached.
sentences.chinese: 申請書應當載明申請理由，並附有關證據。

sentences.english: In the diplomas shall be recorded the length of study and the subjects studied.
sentences.chinese: 結業證書應當載明修業年限和學業內容。

sentences.english: Evaluate conclusion is just valid on the base date of evaluation which is specified in the evaluation report.
sentences.chinese: 評估結論僅在評估報告載明的評估基準日有效。

sentences.english: The application shall clearly set forth causes for application with relevant evidence attached thereto.
sentences.chinese: 申請書應當載明申請理由，並附有關證據。

sentences.english: In witness whereof the parties hereto have put their hands the day and year first above written.
sentences.chinese: 雙方已於文首載明的日期簽署本協議，以資證明。

sentences.english: There are first the positive institutions embodied in law;
sentences.chinese: 最初，有集中載明於法律中的明定的制度。

sentences.english: The conditions and amount for payment of surrender value shall be specified in the insurance contract.
sentences.chinese: 償付解約金之條件及金額，應載明於保險契約。
